name: @jrapp/ecma-util
description: Root project for a set of ECMAScript utility-modules
author: Joakim J. Rapp

scripts.inst:develop: for i in $(find ./develop -type f -name package.json -maxdepth 2 -mindepth 2 -exec dirname {} \;); do npm --prefix $i i & done 2>/dev/null; wait 2>/dev/null;
scripts.inst:runtime: for i in $(find ./runtime -type f -name package.json -maxdepth 2 -mindepth 2 -exec dirname {} \;); do npm --prefix $i i & done 2>/dev/null; wait 2>/dev/null;
scripts.lint:develop: for i in $(find ./develop -type f -name package.json -maxdepth 2 -mindepth 2 -exec dirname {} \;); do printf "linting $i... "; eslint $i; echo "done"; done;
scripts.lint:runtime: for i in $(find ./runtime -type f -name package.json -maxdepth 2 -mindepth 2 -exec dirname {} \;); do printf "linting $i... "; eslint $i; echo "done"; done;
scripts.test:runtime: for i in $(find ./runtime -type f -name package.json -maxdepth 2 -mindepth 2 -exec dirname {} \;); do echo "\ntesting $i...\n "; npm --prefix $i test; done;
scripts.postinstall: npm run inst:develop && npm run inst:runtime
scripts.lint: npm run lint:develop && npm run lint:runtime
